item.title: Cancer Survival Hits 70% Milestone, but Worrying Trends Seen
item.description: The latest edition of an annual report finds new cases continue to rise and outcomes have worsened for some cancers. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Radiation-Cancer Drug Combo Shows Low Adverse Events Risk
item.description: Metastasis-directed stereotactic radiotherapy alongside biological cancer therapy appears safe, new data show. Medscape Medical News
